Constructor Detail

XMLHelper

public XMLHelper()
Method Detail

getType

public static Type getType(Element element)
Gets the type of ApproxsimObject represented by the provided dom element. Casts the provided Element to an ElementImpl to avoid the problem that the getSchemaTypeInfo method does not exist in 1.4.2. This is not a perfect solution but rather an acceptable hack until 1.5 becomed default version. If the getSchemaTypeInfo method fails the xsi:type attribute is checked. This will occur when validation is switched off, which it often is for performance reasons.

Parameters:
element - The dom element to get the type for.
Returns:
The type of ApproxsimObject the element represents.

getFirstChildByTag

public static Element getFirstChildByTag(Node n,
                                         String tag)
Gets the first child Element of n that has a tag matching 'tag'.

Parameters:
n - The Node from which to get the Element
Returns:
The first child Element of n that has a tag matching 'tag' or null if there was no such Element.

getChildElementsByTag

public static Vector getChildElementsByTag(Node n,
                                           String tag)
Gets child Elements of n that has a tag matching 'tag'.

Parameters:
n - The Node from which to get the Element
tag - The tag.
Returns:
A Vector containing all elements with the specified tag.

getString

public static String getString(Node n)
Gets the String contained in the first TEXT_NODE child of n. For example, if we know that n has an element with tag TAG, this method returns the value VALUE between the tags 'VALUE'.

Parameters:
n - The Node from which to get the String
Returns:
The String contained in the first TEXT_NODE child of n.

The value of the string.
